Uses of Package
sensors

Packages that use sensors
driveSystems   
sensors   
 

Classes in sensors used by driveSystems
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorEvent
          A SensorEvent for AnalogSensors.
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each AnalogSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
Encoder
          An encoder sensor.
Encoder.EncoderListener
          An interface that should be implemented by all listeners.
Sensor.SensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each sensor type to include a method they call with their events.
 

Classes in sensors used by sensors
AnalogSensor
          An analog sensor (provides real number values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorEvent
          A SensorEvent for AnalogSensors.
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each AnalogSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
BooleanSensor
          A boolean sensor (only provides boolean values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
BooleanSensor.BooleanSensorEvent
          A BooleanSensor event, which is sent to listeners.
BooleanSensor.BooleanSensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each BooleanSensor type to include a method they call with their events.
IntegralSensor
          An integral sensor (only provides integral values) which is easily extensible by more specific sensors.
IntegralSensor.IntegralSensorEvent
          An IntegralSensor event, which is sent to listeners.
Sensor
          A sensor supporting listeners, encapsulating much of the functionality of the sensors in the package, and should be extended to provide more kinds of sensors.
Sensor.SensorEvent
          A class that should be extended by each sensor type with an event for that sensor.
Sensor.SensorListener
          An interface that should be extended by each sensor type to include a method they call with their events.
SensorThread
          A thread that checks all sensors for whether they should fire an event.
